pwa.install_md:
### Tired of opening this webpage every time?
If you wish to:
1. Have an independent window, as if using local software
1. Add to the local compressed file opening method for easy direct opening
1. Use offline
### Welcome to install this page as a PWA app on your computerüòÉüëç
pwa.tip_enter_url: Please enter the URL of the compressed file
pwa.tip_md:
# ComicRead PWA
Read **local** comics using [ComicRead](https://github.com/hymbz/ComicReadScript) reading mode.
---
### Drag and drop image files, folders, or compressed files directly to start reading
*You can also choose to **paste directly** or **enter** the URL of the compressed file for downloading and reading*

option.auto_scroll_trigger_end: Continue scrolling on the end page
option.auto_switch_page_mode: Auto switch single/double page mode by aspect ratio
option.first_page_fill: Enable first page fill by default
option.img_recognition_warn: ‚ùó The current browser does not support Web Workers. Enabling this feature may cause page lag. It's recommended to upgrade or switch browsers.
option.img_recognition_warn_2: ‚ùó The current website does not support Web Workers. Enabling this feature may cause page lag.
option.scroll_end_auto: First jump to previous/next chapter, else exit
option.show_comments: Show comments on the end page

translation.cotrans_tip:
Using the interface provided by Cotrans to translate images, which is maintained by its maintainer at their own expense.

When multiple people use it at the same time, they need to queue and wait. If the waiting queue reaches its limit, uploading new images will result in an error. Please try again after a while.

So please mind the frequency of use.

It is highly recommended to use your own locally deployed project, as it does not consume server resources and does not require queuing.
translation.translate_to_end: Translate the current page to the end
